import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,LineElement,PointElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Box,Paper,Typography,useTheme}from'@mui/material';import{Skeleton}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,LineElement,PointElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const CagrChart=_ref=>{let{incomeStatements}=_ref;const theme=useTheme();// Filter only 'yearly' type and sort by date
const yearlyData=incomeStatements.filter(item=>item.type==='yearly').sort((a,b)=>new Date(a.date)-new Date(b.date));const data={labels:yearlyData.map(financial=>financial.date),datasets:[{label:'Total Revenue',data:yearlyData.map(financial=>parseFloat(financial.total_revenue)),borderColor:theme.palette.primary.main,backgroundColor:theme.palette.primary.light,fill:false},{label:'Gross Profit',data:yearlyData.map(financial=>parseFloat(financial.gross_profit)),borderColor:theme.palette.secondary.main,backgroundColor:theme.palette.secondary.light,fill:false},{label:'Net Income',data:yearlyData.map(financial=>parseFloat(financial.net_income)),borderColor:theme.palette.success.main,backgroundColor:theme.palette.success.light,fill:false}]};const options={plugins:{title:{display:true,text:'Yearly Financials Over 5 Years',// Customize title styling
font:{size:16,// Adjust font size as needed
weight:'bold'// Make it bold
},color:'white',// Text color
padding:10,// Add padding
backgroundColor:theme.palette.primary.main,// Background color
textAlign:'center'// Center the text
},legend:{position:'top'}},responsive:true,maintainAspectRatio:false,scales:{y:{beginAtZero:false,ticks:{callback:function(value,index,ticks){return value/1e9+'B';}}},x:{}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{p:1,bgcolor:theme.palette.primary.main,textAlign:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",sx:{color:'common.white',textAlign:'center'},children:"5 Year Income"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{paddingTop:theme.spacing(1),paddingLeft:theme.spacing(2),paddingRight:theme.spacing(2)},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{height:'300px'},children:yearlyData?/*#__PURE__*/ // Render the chart if yearlyData is available
_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:options}):/*#__PURE__*/ // Render a skeleton loader if yearlyData is not available
_jsx(Skeleton,{variant:"rectangular",height:300})})})]});};export default CagrChart;
